mapper.select: SELECT userid,username,useremail,userpass,usertel,TO_CHAR(tfend, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tfend FROM userinfo WHERE usertel='010-1111-1111'
mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET usertf = 1, tfstart = sysdate, tfend = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, 12), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo( usertf,tfstart,tfend ) VALUES ( #{usertf}, sysdate, sysdate )
